APPLY_START_DTTM = to_date(#{applyStartDttm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'),
APPLY_END_DTTM = to_date(#{applyEndDttm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'),
PRMT_CONTENT_HTML = #{prmtContentHtml:CLOB},
PRMT_WEB_BANNER_IMG_PATH = NVL(#{prmtWebBannerImgPath}, ''),
PRMT_WEB_BANNER_IMG = NVL(#{prmtWebBannerImg}, ''),
PRMT_MOBILE_BANNER_IMG_PATH = NVL(#{prmtMobileBannerImgPath}, ''),
PRMT_MOBILE_BANNER_IMG = NVL(#{prmtMobileBannerImg}, ''),
PRMT_TARGET_EXPT_CD = #{prmtTargetExptCd},
PRMT_DC_VALUE = NVL(#{prmtDcValue}, 0),
PRMT_TYPE_CD = #{prmtTypeCd},
PRMT_DC_GB_CD = #{prmtDcGbCd},
PRMT_LOADRATE = #{prmtLoadrate},
PRMT_GOODS_GB_CD = #{prmtGoodsGbCd},
PRMT_MAIN_EXPS_USE_YN = #{prmtMainExpsUseYn},

PRMT_MAIN_EXPS_SEQ = #{prmtMainExpsSeq},

/* promotion.exhibition.deleteExhibition - 기획전 삭제*/ UPDATE TP_PROMOTION SET DEL_YN = 'Y', UPDR_NO = #{updrNo}, UPD_DTTM = sysdate, DELR_NO = #{updrNo}, DEL_DTTM = sysdate, DLGT_IMG_PATH = null, DLGT_IMG_NM = null, DLGT_IMG_ORG_NM = null WHERE PRMT_NO IN #{item.prmtNo} AND SITE_NO = #{siteNo}
mapper.select: /* promotion.exhibition.selectExhibitionDtl - 기획전 정보 조회 (단건)*/ SELECT PRMT.PRMT_NO, PRMT.PRMT_NM, PRMT.PRMT_DSCRT, TO_CHAR(PRMT.APPLY_START_DTTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AS APPLY_START_DTTM, TO_CHAR(PRMT.APPLY_END_DTTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AS APPLY_END_DTTM, PRMT.PRMT_CONTENT_HTML, replace(PRMT.PRMT_WEB_BANNER_IMG_PATH,'\','/') AS PRMT_WEB_BANNER_IMG_PATH, PRMT.PRMT_WEB_BANNER_IMG, replace(PRMT.PRMT_MOBILE_BANNER_IMG_PATH,'\','/') AS PRMT_MOBILE_BANNER_IMG_PATH, PRMT.PRMT_MOBILE_BANNER_IMG, PRMT.PRMT_DC_VALUE, PRMT.PRMT_TARGET_EXPT_CD, PRMT.PRMT_TYPE_CD, PRMT.PRMT_DC_GB_CD, PRMT.PRMT_LOADRATE, PRMT.PRMT_GOODS_GB_CD, PRMT.PRMT_BRAND_NO, NVL(BRAND.BRAND_NM,'') AS BRAND_NM, NVL(PRMT.PRMT_MAIN_EXPS_USE_YN,'N') AS PRMT_MAIN_EXPS_USE_YN, PRMT.PRMT_MAIN_EXPS_PST, PRMT.PRMT_MAIN_EXPS_SEQ, PRMT.FIRST_BUY_SPC_PRICE, PRMT.SEO_SEARCH_WORD, PRMT.AGE_CD, PRMT.GOODS_TYPE_CD, (PRMT.DLGT_IMG_PATH||'/'||PRMT.DLGT_IMG_NM) as DLGT_IMG, PRMT.DLGT_IMG_ORG_NM FROM TP_PROMOTION PRMT LEFT JOIN TG_BRAND BRAND ON PRMT.PRMT_BRAND_NO = BRAND.BRAND_NO WHERE PRMT.SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND PRMT.PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} AND PRMT.DEL_YN ='N'

/* promotion.exhibition.selectExhibitionDispzone - 전시존 정보 조회*/ SELECT PRMT_DISPZONE_NO, DISPZONE_NM, USE_YN FROM TP_PROMOTION_DISPZONE A WHERE 1=1 AND PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} AND PRMT_DISPZONE_NO > 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRMT_DISPZONE_NO

/* promotion.exhibition.selectExhibitionTargetGoods - 기획전대상 상품 조회*/ SELECT rownum, A.* FROM ( SELECT fn_getGoodsImgPath(tptg.GOODS_NO, '02') AS IMG_PATH, tg.GOODS_NM , tg.GOODS_NO , (SELECT BRAND_NM FROM TG_BRAND WHERE tg.BRAND_NO = BRAND_NO) AS BRAND_NM, ts.SELLER_NM , ti.SALE_PRICE , ti.STOCK_QTT , fn_getCodeNm('GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD', tg.GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD) as GOODS_SALE_STATUS_NM , tepm.ERP_ITM_CODE FROM TP_PROMOTION_TARGET_GOODS tptg INNER JOIN TG_GOODS tg ON tptg.GOODS_NO = tg.GOODS_NO INNER JOIN TG_ITEM ti ON tg.ITEM_NO = ti.ITEM_NO INNER JOIN TS_SELLER ts ON tg.SELLER_NO = ts.SELLER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_ERP_PRD_MAPPING tepm ON tg.ITEM_NO = tepm.MALL_ITM_CODE where tptg.PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} ORDER BY tptg.APPLY_SEQ ) A

/* promotion.exhibition.selectExhibitionTargetGoodsList */ SELECT BB.GOODS_NO , MAX(BB.MALL_ITM_CODE) as MALL_ITM_CODE , MAX(BB.ERP_ITM_CODE) as ERP_ITM_CODE , MAX(BB.MALL_GOODS_NO) as MALL_GOODS_NO , MAX(BB.GOODS_TYPE_CD) AS GOODS_TYPE_CD , MAX(BB.SELLER_NO) AS SELLER_NO , MAX(BB.GOODS_NM) AS GOODS_NM , MAX(BB.ITEM_NO) AS ITEM_NO , MAX(BB.GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD) AS GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD , MAX(BB.GOODS_IMG_02) AS GOODS_IMG_02 , MAX(BB.GOODS_THUM_IMG) AS GOODS_THUM_IMG , MAX(BB.ACCM_SALE_AMT) AS ACCM_SALE_AMT , MAX(BB.ACCM_SALE_CNT) AS ACCM_SALE_CNT , MAX(BB.GOODS_SVMN_AMT) AS GOODS_SVMN_AMT , MAX(BB.BRAND_NO) AS BRAND_NO , MAX(BB.BRAND_NM) AS BRAND_NM , MAX(BB.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MAX(BB.CUSTOMER_PRICE) AS CUSTOMER_PRICE , MAX(BB.SALE_PRICE) AS SALE_PRICE , MAX(BB.SALE_RATE) AS SALE_RATE , MAX(BB.SUPPLY_PRICE) AS SUPPLY_PRICE , MAX(BB.FIRST_BUY_SPC_PRICE) AS FIRST_BUY_SPC_PRICE , MAX(BB.STOCK_QTT) AS STOCK_QTT , MAX(BB.SITE_NO) AS SITE_NO , MAX(BB.SELLER_NM) AS SELLER_NM , MAX(BB.GOODS_SALE_STATUS_NM) AS GOODS_SALE_STATUS_NM , (SELECT MAX(fn_categoryName(TGC.CTG_NO, #{siteNo})) FROM TG_GOODS_CTG TGC WHERE TGC.GOODS_NO = BB.GOODS_NO AND TGC.SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND TGC.DEL_YN = 'N') AS CTG_NAME FROM (SELECT (SELECT MAX(MALL_ITM_CODE) FROM TI_ERP_PRD_MAPPING TPM WHERE TPM.MALL_GOODS_NO = ITM.GOODS_NO AND TPM.MALL_ITM_CODE = ITM.ITEM_NO) AS MALL_ITM_CODE, (SELECT MAX(ERP_ITM_CODE) FROM TI_ERP_PRD_MAPPING TPM WHERE TPM.MALL_GOODS_NO = ITM.GOODS_NO AND TPM.MALL_ITM_CODE = ITM.ITEM_NO) AS ERP_ITM_CODE, (SELECT MAX(MALL_GOODS_NO) FROM TI_ERP_PRD_MAPPING TPM WHERE TPM.MALL_GOODS_NO = ITM.GOODS_NO AND TPM.MALL_ITM_CODE = ITM.ITEM_NO) AS MALL_GOODS_NO, GDS.GOODS_NO, GDS.GOODS_TYPE_CD, GDS.SELLER_NO, (SELECT SELLER_NM FROM TS_SELLER WHERE SELLER_NO = GDS.SELLER_NO) AS SELLER_NM, GDS.GOODS_NM, GDS.ITEM_NO, GDS.GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD, fn_getCodeNm('GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD', GDS.GOODS_SALE_STATUS_CD) AS GOODS_SALE_STATUS_NM, fn_getGoodsImgPath(GDS.GOODS_NO, '02') AS GOODS_IMG_02, (SELECT B.IMG_PATH || '_' || B.IMG_NM FROM TG_GOODS_IMG_SET A, TG_GOODS_IMG_DTL B WHERE A.GOODS_IMGSET_NO = B.GOODS_IMGSET_NO AND A.GOODS_NO = GDS.GOODS_NO AND B.GOODS_IMG_TYPE = '02' AND A.DLGT_IMG_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS GOODS_THUM_IMG, NVL(GDS.ACCM_SALE_AMT, 0) AS ACCM_SALE_AMT, NVL(GDS.ACCM_SALE_CNT, 0) AS ACCM_SALE_CNT, NVL(GDS.GOODS_SVMN_AMT, 0) AS GOODS_SVMN_AMT, GDS.BRAND_NO, fn_getBrandNm(GDS.BRAND_NO) AS BRAND_NM, ITM.ITEM_NM, NVL(ITM.CUSTOMER_PRICE, 0) AS CUSTOMER_PRICE, NVL(ITM.SALE_PRICE, 0) AS SALE_PRICE, decode(nvl(ITM.CUSTOMER_PRICE, 0), 0, 0, 100 - (ITM.SALE_PRICE / ITM.CUSTOMER_PRICE) * 100) AS SALE_RATE, NVL(ITM.SUPPLY_PRICE, 0) AS SUPPLY_PRICE, (SELECT MAX(FIRST_BUY_SPC_PRICE) FROM TP_PROMOTION TP, TP_PROMOTION_TARGET_GOODS TPTG WHERE TP.PRMT_NO = TPTG.PRMT_NO AND TPTG.GOODS_NO = GDS.GOODS_NO AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TP.APPLY_START_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TP.APPLY_END_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TP.DEL_YN = 'N') AS FIRST_BUY_SPC_PRICE, (SELECT SUM(STOCK_QTT) FROM TG_ITEM WHERE GOODS_NO = GDS.GOODS_NO AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS STOCK_QTT, GDS.SITE_NO FROM TG_GOODS GDS , TS_SITE TS , TP_PROMOTION_TARGET_GOODS TPTG , TG_ITEM ITM LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_ERP_PRD_MAPPING TPM ON TPM.MALL_GOODS_NO = ITM.GOODS_NO AND TPM.MALL_ITM_CODE = ITM.ITEM_NO WHERE GDS.ITEM_NO = ITM.ITEM_NO AND GDS.SITE_NO = TS.SITE_NO AND GDS.SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND GDS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ITM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TPTG.GOODS_NO = GDS.GOODS_NO AND TPTG.PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} ) BB GROUP BY BB.GOODS_NO

/* promotion.exhibition.selectExhibitionGoodsListPaging - 기획전대상 상품 조회*/ /* 특정상품/카테고리만 설정인 경우 아래 조회된 GOODS_NO의 정보를 조회 */ /* 특정상품/카테고리만 예외설정인 경우 전체 상품을 조회해서 아래 GOODS_NO만 제외 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS PAGING_NUM, ROWNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT TG.GOODS_NO, TG.GOODS_NM, TB.BRAND_NO, TB.BRAND_NM, TG.PR_WORDS, TI.CUSTOMER_PRICE, TI.SALE_PRICE, FLOOR((TI.SALE_PRICE*TP.PRMT_DC_VALUE/100)/10)*10 AS PROMOTION_DC_AMT, fn_getGoodsImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, '01') AS GOODS_IMG_01, fn_getGoodsImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, '02') AS GOODS_IMG_02, fn_getGoodsImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, '03') AS GOODS_IMG_03, fn_getGoodsDispImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, 'A') AS GOODS_DISP_IMG_A, fn_getGoodsDispImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, 'B') AS GOODS_DISP_IMG_B, fn_getGoodsDispImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, 'C') AS GOODS_DISP_IMG_C, fn_getGoodsDispImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, 'D') AS GOODS_DISP_IMG_D, fn_getGoodsDispImgPath(TG.GOODS_NO, 'E') AS GOODS_DISP_IMG_E, fn_getGoodsIcon(TG.GOODS_NO, '5') AS ICON_IMGS, TP.PRMT_DC_VALUE FROM TP_PROMOTION TP, TP_PROMOTION_TARGET_GOODS TPTG, TG_ITEM TI, TG_GOODS TG LEFT OUTER JOIN TG_BRAND TB ON TG.BRAND_NO = TB.BRAND_NO WHERE TP.PRMT_NO = TPTG.PRMT_NO AND TG.ITEM_NO = TI.ITEM_NO AND TPTG.GOODS_NO = TG.GOODS_NO AND TP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TP.PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} AND TP.SITE_NO = #{siteNo} ) T )

/* promotion.exhibition.selectExhibitionGoodsListPagingCount - 기획전대상 상품 조회 검색 개수 */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TP_PROMOTION TP, TP_PROMOTION_TARGET_GOODS TPTG, TG_ITEM TI, TG_GOODS TG LEFT OUTER JOIN TG_BRAND TB ON TG.BRAND_NO = TB.BRAND_NO WHERE TP.PRMT_NO = TPTG.PRMT_NO AND TG.ITEM_NO = TI.ITEM_NO AND TPTG.GOODS_NO = TG.GOODS_NO AND TP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TP.PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} AND TP.SITE_NO = #{siteNo}

/* promotion.exhibition.selectEhbDispMngList - 진행중인 기획전 전시존 조회*/ SELECT PRMT_NO, PRMT_DISPZONE_NO, DISPZONE_NM, USE_YN FROM TP_PROMOTION_DISPZONE
WHERE PRMT_NO = #{prmtNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY PRMT_DISPZONE_NO
